    def update_contact(self, mobile: str, email: str, street1: str = None):
        # Update Contact Details. If the section is read-only, click Edit first.
    
        # Query mobile input locator
        mobile_input = self.page.get_by_label("Mobile").or_(
            self.page.get_by_placeholder("Mobile")
        ).first
    
        # If mobile input is not visible/editable, try to enable editing by clicking the Edit button only if visible
        try:
            expect(mobile_input).to_be_visible(timeout=1500)
        except Exception:
            # Try several selectors for an Edit control without waiting for long timeouts
            try:
                edit_btn = self.page.get_by_role("button", name="Edit")
                if edit_btn.count() and edit_btn.first.is_visible():
                    edit_btn.first.click()
                    self.page.wait_for_timeout(500)
                else:
                    alt = self.page.locator("button:has-text('Edit')")
                    if alt.count() and alt.first.is_visible():
                        alt.first.click()
                        self.page.wait_for_timeout(500)
            except Exception:
                # If enabling edit failed, continue and let the subsequent fills fail with clearer error
                pass
    
        # Re-query inputs after attempting to enable edit
        # Try multiple selectors and pick the first visible input to avoid long timeouts
        candidates = [
            self.page.get_by_label("Mobile"),
            self.page.get_by_placeholder("Mobile"),
            self.page.locator("input[name=mobile]"),
            self.page.locator("input[id*='mobile']"),
            self.page.locator("input[placeholder*='Mobile']"),
        ]
    
        mobile_input = None
        for c in candidates:
            try:
                if c.count() and c.first.is_visible():
                    mobile_input = c.first
                    break
            except Exception:
                continue
    
        if not mobile_input:
